name: MagesQuest; The Full Release
description:
MAGESQUEST:

Welcome to the second best game to ever exist. It's finally here, and with more updates to come, this game will stay here for a while. I improved on a lot of the flaws from the beta, but I had to remove some features due to limitations. But hopefully you'll still find the fun in it. Eventually I will add back the missing features, and some new ones along side new levels with them.

CONTROLS:

Yeah these are kind of important so the basics are like this:

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

You can you the space bar to jump if you please.

Press down or the "S" key to fall through platforms.

R to reset the level if you get stuck.

M to mute the music (but why would you?)

X or press the x in the bottom left to go to menu.

Also you have a double jump, use it wisely.

REVIEWS:

"Good/10" - MagesQuest Beta World Record Holder

"Pretty good Platformer" - Unbiased fan

"Subscribe to WaterMaster67" - WaterMaster67

CREDITS:

The characters, the sprites and the game were all made by me.

The amazing song was made by @Ar2OO.

Level 19 was designed by https://kingofcold.itch.io/.

Go sub to me here so I can do more cool stuff.

UPDATE NOTES: 

This is empty for now but it'll have a use eventually.
